meta.title: ElAmir for IT and Telecom
meta.description: Leading technology company in Libya providing IT infrastructure, telecommunications, networking, security systems, software development, consulting, and maintenance services.

hero.title: Leading IT & Telecom Solutions in Libya
hero.subtitle: Innovative technology solutions for businesses of all sizes

about.title: About ElAmir
about.content: ElAmir for IT and Telecom is a leading technology company in Libya, providing comprehensive IT and telecommunications solutions to businesses and organizations across the country. With years of experience and a team of skilled professionals, we deliver innovative and reliable services tailored to meet our clients' specific needs.

hero.title: About ElAmir for IT and Telecom
hero.subtitle: Your Trusted Technology Partner in Libya

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content: To provide innovative and reliable IT and telecommunications solutions that empower businesses and organizations in Libya to achieve their goals and drive growth.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be the leading provider of technology solutions in Libya, recognized for our expertise, reliability, and commitment to excellence.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We continuously seek new and better ways to solve problems and deliver value to our clients.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for excellence in everything we do, from the solutions we provide to the service we deliver.

integrity.title: Integrity
integrity.description: We conduct our business with honesty, transparency, and ethical standards.

collaboration.title: Collaboration
collaboration.description: We work closely with our clients and partners to achieve shared goals and mutual success.

customerFocus.title: Customer Focus
customerFocus.description: We put our clients at the center of everything we do, understanding their needs and exceeding their expectations.

team.title: Our Team

itInfrastructure.title: IT Infrastructure
itInfrastructure.description: We design, implement, and maintain robust IT infrastructure solutions that provide the foundation for your business operations.

telecommunications.title: Telecommunications
telecommunications.description: Our telecommunications solutions enable reliable and efficient communication for businesses of all sizes.

networking.title: Networking
networking.description: We provide secure and scalable network solutions that connect your business and enable seamless communication and collaboration.

securitySystems.title: Security Systems
securitySystems.description: Our comprehensive security solutions protect your business assets and ensure the safety of your people and property.

softwareDevelopment.title: Software Development
softwareDevelopment.description: We develop custom software solutions tailored to your specific business needs, helping you streamline operations and improve efficiency.

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.description: Our expert consultants provide strategic advice and guidance on technology strategy and implementation, helping you make informed decisions.

support.title: Support & Maintenance
support.description: We provide ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your systems operate at optimal performance and minimize downtime.

hero.title: Careers at ElAmir
hero.subtitle: Join Our Team of Technology Experts

culture.title: Our Culture
culture.content: At ElAmir, we foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. We believe in empowering our employees to grow professionally and personally, and we provide the resources and support they need to succeed.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.description: We embrace new ideas and technologies to stay at the forefront of our industry.

teamwork.title: Teamwork
teamwork.description: We collaborate effectively, leveraging our diverse skills and perspectives.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.description: We strive for the highest standards in everything we do.

benefits.title: Benefits
benefits.subtitle: What We Offer Our Team Members

competitive.title: Competitive Compensation
competitive.description: Attractive salary packages and performance bonuses that recognize your contributions.

health.title: Health Benefits
health.description: Comprehensive health insurance coverage for you and your family.

professional.title: Professional Development
professional.description: Ongoing training, certification support, and learning opportunities.

work.title: Work-Life Balance
work.description: Flexible scheduling options and generous paid time off.

career.title: Career Growth
career.description: Clear advancement paths and opportunities to grow within the company.

team.title: Collaborative Environment
team.description: Work with talented professionals in a supportive and inclusive workplace.

openings.title: Current Openings
openings.subtitle: Explore Available Positions
openings.noOpenings: There are currently no open positions. Please check back later or send your resume to careers@attc.ly for future opportunities.

form.title: Application Form
form.subtitle: Apply for a Position
form.name: Full Name
form.experienceHint: Briefly describe your relevant work experience, including companies, roles, and key achievements.
form.educationHint: List your educational qualifications, including degrees, institutions, and graduation years.
form.coverLetterHint: Tell us why you're interested in this position and how your skills and experience make you a good fit.
form.resumeHint: Please upload your resume in PDF or Word format (max 5MB).
form.success: Your application has been submitted successfully. We will contact you if your qualifications match our requirements.
form.error: There was an error submitting your application. Please try again later.
